title: Is that Rahul Gandhi Looking At a Bikini-Clad Woman? No, It’s Fake
subtitle: A fake photograph of Congress President Rahul Gandhi checking out an image of a bikini-clad woman on his mobile phone has been circulating on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
(Translation - Photographs never lie… Look at what Rahul Gandhi is doing).

With these words, a photograph of Congress President Rahul Gandhi checking out an image of a bikini-clad woman on his mobile phone has been circulating on social media.

A Facebook page, Yogi Sarkar which has more than 400,000 followers posted this photograph on 30 July, 2018. It has been shared more than 7000 times since then. It has also been shared in the Facebook group Modi Mission 2019 which has over 130,000 members.
